code: import{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import RulesScreen from'./rulesScreen';import GameScreen from'./gameScreen';import Scoreboard from'./scoreboard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[showing,setShowing]=useState('rules');if(showing==='rules'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RulesScreen,{setShowing:setShowing});}else if(showing==='game'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GameScreen,{setShowing:setShowing});}else if(showing==='scoreboard'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Scoreboard,{setShowing:setShowing});}}export default App;
